zh.title: 中国共产党中央“四人帮”被逮捕
英国布莱顿酒店爆炸案，撒切尔夫人幸免
埃及开罗发生强烈地震
巴厘岛爆炸案，造成重大人员伤亡
杨利伟成为中国首位进入太空的宇航员
中国大陆与台湾实现首次周末包机直航
欧盟获得诺贝尔和平奖
马拉拉·优素福获得诺贝尔和平奖
美国宣布退出联合国教科文组织

en.title: Hua Guofeng succeeds Mao Zedong as Chairman of the CCP
US Navy intercepts Egyptian plane carrying Achille Lauro hijackers
Cairo earthquake kills over 500 people in Egypt.
The U.S. House of Representatives begins impeachment hearings against President Bill Clinton.
Soyuz TM-31 launches, beginning permanent human presence on ISS.
Bali bombings kill over 200 people, mostly tourists.
China launches Shenzhou 6, its second manned space mission.
President Trump announces he will not recertify the Iran nuclear deal.
Dominique Ducharme is named head coach of the Montreal Canadiens
